name: Inferno Survival
description:
INFERNO SURVIVAL

You play as Rumble, a fire wisp trying to be kind and not melt the ice wisps passing by him. Be sure to avoid the ice wisps using the arrow keys to be nice to the wisps and so you don't drown.

The wisps get more frequent periodically and the water flushes back to the bottom periodically.

Try to pick up the Green and Pink Power-Ups which give you intangibility and shrunken ice wisps respectively.

This is my first real game so it's rough and will be updated over time but I'm proud of what I made.

Everything within the game is made by yours truly.
